name: Senior C Developer [Remote]
description:
CloudLinux, the worldwide leader in the development of the Linux operating system for web hostings, with a large number of customers all around the world, is looking for a Senior C Engineer with strong experience in web-server module development / understanding of the web-server architecture and related technologies (nginx/apache/litespeed), and will join the I360-C-Team.

We develop our products - CloudLinux OS, KernelCare, and Imunify360 - using the most innovative technologies. Our products are used by thousands of companies around the world.

Work is fully remote, with flexible hours, so you can plan your day and work from anywhere in the world. We are a company, who has been working remotely for 6 years, and we know how to do it right.

Join us to make the difference!

Requirements:

  • Extensive experience in the development of web-server modules: Nginx (required), Apache/OpenLiteSpeed (desirable) and understanding of the web-server architecture and workflow.
  • 5+ years of С programming experience
  • GNU/Linux operating system and shell scripting experience
  • Ability to work with various build systems like autotools, make and cmake
  • Experience with git-based development processes
  • Python, Perl or other scripting language knowledge will be a plus
  • Golang and LUA language knowledge will be a plus
  • Experience in debugging(mostly gdb and command line)

You will do:

  • Design and development of Nginx-modules and other security extensions for a web-hosting security product,
  • Work with various open-source and proprietary projects such as Nginx, OpenSSL, OpenSSH, Apache, OpenLiteSpeed and others,
  • Implement modules integrations

What we can offer you:

  • Remote working with long-term employment on a full-time basis under contract
  • Compensation in US dollars
  • Flexible working hours
  • A great opportunity for professional development within a fast-growing company on a product with a 300,000 server installation base
  • Interesting and challenging projects
  • Paid one month vacation per year and sick leaves
  • Medical insurance
  • Days off on national holidays
  • Knowledge-Exchange

Let’s make it a win-win for you and CloudLinux. Do not put off until later - apply today and our team will gladly welcome you.
